segments.text: Is everything ready for the Christmas party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Almost . I ’ Ve put up the decorations , and we ’ Ve decorated the Christmas tree with plenty of tinsel and baubles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the big star on the top of the tree . I ’ ll put the presents under the tree later , how ’ s the food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve prepared most of it already and we ’ Ve got plenty of snack foods-you know , crisps , biscuits , and things . Are you going to make the punch ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I ’ Ve bought all the things to go in it . It won ’ t take long to make . How many people are coming to the party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think everyone will be coming . Dave don ’ t come because he has to go to his parent ’ s home and they live in Scotland .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we do . I hope we have enough for everyone . Did you send out all your Christmas cards in time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did . I send most of them a week ago . I ’ Ve brought some with me to the party to give to people in person .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did the same . I spent hours yesterday evening wrapping presents . I hope I didn ’ t forget to buy anyone something !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you didn ’ t forget mine !
segments.speaker: S1
